name: CubiXIOM
description:
Try to not die!

  • "a" or left arrow/click to go left.
  •  "d"  or right arrow/click to go right.

Enjoy my game, futur developpement possible :)

  • V. 1.3 Add Post-processing to menus
    • Fix: Add function to prevent sleeping mode on phone
    • Add sound & music
    • Add particle effects on collision
    • Add particle effects in levels
    • Explosion of the player at collision
    • Fix: Music audio normalisation
    • Fix: Optimisation of obstacles physics
  • V. 1.2 Add Start Menu
    • Add Post-processing effects
    • Add Accelerometer control on mobile
    • Fix: Add level # at the end of levels
    • Brand new textures
    • Shadows optimisation
  • V. 1.1 Add keyboard (arrows) and mouse inputs
    • Add one new level
  • V. 1.0 Orignal game

Known issues:

#1 Music of the levels in playing in the menus

#2 End level diplayed when we crash at the end

Note: For the best performances, use discrete graphics in browser.
